structure.unit: ARTICLE XI. PUBLIC CHARTER SCHOOL FACILITIES

law.catch_line: Public hearing required in all districts.

text.section:
Sec. 33-153. Public hearing required in all districts.
The establishment, expansion or modification of a charter school facility is permitted in any zoning district after public hearing upon demonstration that the standards established in this article have been met. Any existing covenant or declaration of restrictions relating to an existing charter school facility shall be modified or deleted only in accordance with the provisions of Article XXXVI of this code.
